abstract: Camille Cosby, despite her lawyers' efforts to halt proceedings, gives deposition testimony in Springfield, Mass, in civil defamation case filed by 7 women against her husband Bill Cosby.
snippet: Bill Cosby’s wife of 52 years, Camille, gave deposition testimony Monday in a civil case filed against him by seven women who say he defamed them, despite last-minute efforts by her lawyers to halt the deposition.
lead_paragraph: Bill Cosby’s wife of 52 years, Camille, gave deposition testimony Monday in a civil case filed against him by seven women who say he defamed them, despite last-minute efforts by her lawyers to halt the deposition.
